title: CMS-Based Self-Regulated Science Project Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Secondary Science Curriculum, Basic CMS Usage
context.additional_context: A project for developing science education content. Improving self-regulated learning strategies by analyzing CMS tool utilization patterns

learning_goals: Learners can analyze CMS tool usage patterns in a PBL environment and explain more than three self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners can develop and implement a CMS tool utilization plan reflecting goal orientation (learning goals/performance goals).
Learners can analyze the correlation between the frequency of collaborative tool usage (forums, shared documents) in CMS and learning outcomes in a project report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
